alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 9:41PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1030 PM MST... At 941 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morristown, or 8 miles north of Circle City, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Circle City, Wittmann and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 111 and 132. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
